description:
Qwenthur and Havia bought time for Milinda`s Baby Magnum against the Tri-Core, but when things start to look dicey for Milinda, Qwenthur has to decide whether he wants to try his luck against this Object yet again.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Oyayubi Tom wa Yuden o Hashiru: Gibraltar Tsuukou Soshisen II
Tom Pouce dans le pétrole. La Bataille de Gibraltar, partie 2
Tom Thumb Races Through the Oil Field: The Battle of the Gibraltar Blockade II
親指トムは油田を走る ジブラルタル通行阻止戦 II
